name: King's cup 👑🥤
description:
King's Cup is a social drinking game where players take turns drawing cards and doing actions based on the cards. You can read the rules for this game online!


There are two ways you can use this Figma file to play Kings cup:


1/ Play in the Figma Editor

You can use the variants panel on to flip over a card, by switching on / off the “Showing” property when a card is selected. This works best if you are playing with multiple people remotely.


2/ Play in Prototyping view

When viewing as a prototype, you can click on the card to flip it over, then click “Remove” to remove the card from the ring. You can play this version on the Community page directly — no need to duplicate!


Cup vector in the thumbnail is from the Cup Icon file on Community.
